FOR MEDIA THURSDAY, 3 JANUARY 1980
STANDING COMMITTEES OF CABINET
The Prime Minister today announced changes in the membership
of the Standing Committees of Cabinet. The changes result
from the revised Ministerial arrangements announced on
7 December 1979.

As appropriate, Ministers will be co-opted to Committees of
which they are not members when particular policy items are
being considered.
The Prime Minister said that Ad Hoc Committees would continue
to be established from time to time to deal with particular
issues not requiring a continuing involvement by Ministers.
